1110100100110100 0100000101011100 1 -> sum: 0010101010010001, cout: 1
1001000100001000 0000100110001000 0 -> sum: 1001101010010000, cout: 0
0000101001001000 0000100010010100 0 -> sum: 0001001011011100, cout: 0
0101011010011110 1011100101000010 0 -> sum: 0000111111100000, cout: 1
1010011101110101 0000001001100011 1 -> sum: 1010100111011001, cout: 0
0000010000001011 0001100110111110 0 -> sum: 0001110111001001, cout: 0
